flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=130>>130 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 130 + 35 = <<130+35=165>>165 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 165 - 15 = 153 books

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 153. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
